;BEGIN:------------------- Byg's Grim Reality Recruitment-------------------;

;------------------------------------------
; BGR COSTS Section
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; Summary of Nobles Expenses and Receipts
;------------------------------------------

        declare_counter noblecost
        declare_counter inflation
        declare_counter nobletax

;------------------------------------------
;Inflation old, retrieve from chars
;------------------------------------------

	set_event_counter inflationon 0
	set_event_counter oldinflation 0

; remember if all characters were 0
; or one or more characters were 1

monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait Inflation = 1
	set_event_counter oldinflation 1
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
; Recruitment charges for Managed/Unmanaged training
; Managed reclaims half to 100 % of these totals back next section
; if no general's discount later then these are the costs captains pay (i.e. double)
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money -200
end_monitor

; all units base recruiting costs 200
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitClass heavy
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money -200
end_monitor

;total recruiting costs HInf400
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money -200
end_monitor

;total recruiting costs  Cav 400/ HCav 600
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory siege
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money -400
end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 600
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory ship
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money -600
end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 800
;------------------------------------------
; with inflation
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -400
end_monitor

; all units base recruiting costs 400
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitClass heavy
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -400
end_monitor

;total recruiting costs HInf800
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -400
end_monitor

;total recruiting costs  Cav 800/ HCav 1200
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory siege
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -800
end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 1200
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event UnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory ship
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -1200
end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 1600
;------------------------------------------
; Managed Recruitment Saves 50% ( if HasWarchest). ( If No Warchest- pays from own wealth instead - so all treasury deducts negated)
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money 100
;	inc_counter noblecost 1
end_monitor

; all units base recruiting costs 100
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 0
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money 200
end_monitor

; all units base recruiting costs 0
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained TrainedUnitClass heavy
	and FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money 100
;	inc_counter noblecost 1
end_monitor

;recruiting costs HInf 200/ HCav 300
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained TrainedUnitClass heavy
	and FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 0
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money 200
end_monitor

;recruiting costs HInf 0/ HCav 0
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
	and FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

end_monitor

end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 400
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained TrainedUnitCategory ship
	and FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 0
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	console_command add_money 600
end_monitor

; total recruiting costs 0
;------------------------------------------
; Managed Recruitment for INFLATION. Saves 50% ( if HasWarchest). ( If No Warchest- pays from own wealth instead - so all treasury deducts negated)
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GovernorUnitTrained FactionIsLocal
	and Trait HasWarchest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money 200

end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; Foraging Costs
;------------------------------------------
; x=1
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -100
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money 100
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and Trait ArmySize = 3
	and not Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -100
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and Trait ArmySize = 4
	and not Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -300
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
; x=1 + Infl
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -200
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money 200
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 1
	and Trait ArmySize = 3
	and not Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -600
end_monitor

	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 2
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -200

	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 2
	and Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	and not InEnemyLands

	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -400
end_monitor

	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 2
	and Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	and IsGeneral

	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	and IsGeneral
	and FactionLeaderTrait x = 2
	and Trait ArmySize = 4
	and not Trait TimeInField = 4
	and not GovernorTaxLevel >= tax_low
	and not InEnemyLands
	and not AtSea
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -1200
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; Fighting Against Orders
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
	set_event_counter battledefy 0

monitor_event PostBattle FactionIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not HasAncType warcouncil
	and InEnemyLands
	and PercentageUnitAttribute general_unit < 100
	and WasAttacker
	and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower >= 3
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;WCs never trigger battledefy even if given WC after crime. WC forgives.
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event PostBattle FactionIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
                and not IsFactionHeir
	and HasAncType warcouncil
	and InEnemyLands
	and PercentageUnitAttribute general_unit < 100
	and WasAttacker
	and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;WCs trigger battledefy only when cp = 4. 31-08-08
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event PostBattle CharacterIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
                and IsFactionHeir
	and HasAncType warcouncil
	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	set_event_counter battledefy 0

end_monitor

; this may stop another general's defiance from showing too as counter is for turn length regardless of character
;remains 1 until factionturn ends. Immunity For Heir if WC during centralised period.
;------------------------------------------
; Good Bad Defiance
;------------------------------------------

        declare_counter capturedgood
        declare_counter capturedbad
        declare_counter lsso

monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and FactionLeaderTrait Good = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_counter capturedgood 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ScrollOpened ScrollOpened loot_settlement_scroll
	set_counter lsso 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed loot_settlement_occupy_button
	and I_CompareCounter capturedgood = 1
	set_counter capturedgood 0
	set_counter lsso 0
end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed loot_settlement_sack_button
	and I_CompareCounter capturedgood = 1
	set_counter capturedgood 0
	set_counter lsso 0
	set_event_counter battledefy 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ScrollClosed ScrollClosed loot_settlement_scroll
	and I_CompareCounter lsso = 1
	and I_CompareCounter capturedgood = 1
	set_counter capturedgood 0
	log Settlement Exterminated
	set_counter lsso 0
	set_event_counter battledefy 1
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and FactionLeaderTrait Bad = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_counter capturedbad 1
end_monitor

;monitor_event ScrollOpened ScrollOpened loot_settlement_scroll
;	set_counter lsso 1
;end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed loot_settlement_occupy_button
	and I_CompareCounter capturedbad = 1
	set_counter capturedbad 0
	set_counter lsso 0
	set_event_counter battledefy 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed loot_settlement_sack_button
	and I_CompareCounter capturedbad = 1
	set_counter capturedbad 0
	set_counter lsso 0
	set_event_counter battledefy 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ScrollClosed ScrollClosed loot_settlement_scroll
	and I_CompareCounter lsso = 1
	and I_CompareCounter capturedbad = 1
	set_counter capturedbad 0
	log Settlement Exterminated
	set_counter lsso 0
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor FactionIsLocal

	and not RansomType release
	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
;	and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
;	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	and FactionLeaderTrait Good = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;For not sparing prisoners
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event ExterminatePopulation FactionIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
;	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	and FactionLeaderTrait Good = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;For not occupying settlement
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event OccupySettlement FactionIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
;	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	and FactionLeaderTrait Bad = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;For occupying settlement if Bad
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor FactionIsLocal

	and not RansomType execute
	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
;	and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
;	and FactionLeaderTrait CentralisedPower = 4
	and FactionLeaderTrait Bad = 1
	and not AtSea
	and not IsOnCrusade
	and not IsOnJihad
	set_event_counter battledefy 1

end_monitor

;remains 1 until factionturn ends.
;for not executing prisoners
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
  if I_EventCounter battledefy = 1
        set_event_counter battledefy 0
  end_if
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; Still Defying Orders (not yet complied with punishment)
;------------------------------------------
	set_event_counter stilldefy 0

monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal

	and IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and Trait NotComplied > 0
	and Trait DefiedOrders > 0
	set_event_counter stilldefy 1

end_monitor

; If any gen notcomplied set stilldefy for FL. Note what if become WC after crime or is heir or wc during central?
;May still trigger LeaderDefied for post crime WCs though.
;remains 1 until factionturn ends
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter stilldefy 0
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
; Pardon Decision
;------------------------------------------
	set_event_counter pardon_attempt 0
	declare_counter general_pardon_decided
	set_counter general_pardon_decided 0

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	set_event_counter general_pardon_accepted 0
	set_event_counter general_pardon_declined 0
	set_counter general_pardon_decided 1
	set_event_counter ready_pardon 0
end_monitor

monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait LeaderDefied > 0
	and Trait NotComplied > 0
	and Trait DefiedOrders >= 3
        set_event_counter ready_pardon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event ScrollAdviceRequested I_EventCounter ready_pardon = 1

        set_event_counter random_accept 0

    if RandomPercent < 60
        set_event_counter random_accept 1
    end_if

	historic_event general_pardon true
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter general_pardon_accepted = 1
and I_CompareCounter general_pardon_decided = 1
        set_event_counter pardon_attempt 1
set_counter general_pardon_decided 0
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter general_pardon_declined = 1
and I_CompareCounter general_pardon_decided = 1
        set_event_counter pardon_attempt 2
set_counter general_pardon_decided 0
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	set_event_counter pardon_attempt 0
	set_event_counter general_pardon_accepted 0
	set_event_counter general_pardon_declined 0
	set_counter general_pardon_decided 0
	set_event_counter random_accept 0
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; Supply Wagons
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
	set_event_counter st 0
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait SupplyWagon = 2
	and HasAncType supplywagon
	set_event_counter st 1
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait SupplyWagon = 3
	and HasAncType supplywagon
	set_event_counter st 2
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait SupplyWagon = 4
	and HasAncType supplywagon
	set_event_counter st 3
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait SupplyWagon = 5
	and HasAncType supplywagon
	set_event_counter st 4
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter st 0
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
; for active army
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
	set_event_counter militaryactive 0
	set_event_counter offer_scutage 0
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionLeaderTrait ReadyForScutage = 1
	set_event_counter offer_scutage 1
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionLeaderTrait ExpeditionTaxOrder = 1
	set_event_counter militaryactive 1
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event RequestTrainingAdvice
  if I_EventCounter offer_scutage = 1
	set_event_counter militaryactive 1
     historic_event militaryactive_1
end_if
  if I_EventCounter offer_scutage = 0
	and I_EventCounter militaryactive = 1
	set_event_counter militaryactive 0
     historic_event militaryactive_0
end_if
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter militaryactive 0
        set_event_counter offer_scutage 0
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
; FL Purchases Estate
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
                and IsGeneral
	and Trait EstatePurchased = 1
	and FactionLeaderTrait xest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -2000
	inc_counter noblecost 20
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
                and IsGeneral
	and Trait EstatePurchased = 1
	and FactionLeaderTrait xest = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -4000
	inc_counter noblecost 40
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
                and IsGeneral
	and Trait EstatePurchased = 1
	and FactionLeaderTrait xest = 2
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0

	console_command add_money -3000
	inc_counter noblecost 30
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
                and IsGeneral
	and Trait EstatePurchased = 1
	and FactionLeaderTrait xest = 2
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	console_command add_money -6000
	inc_counter noblecost 60
end_monitor

	console_command add_money 100

	console_command add_money 200

                and IsGeneral
	and Trait Tax = 8

	console_command add_money 800
	inc_counter nobletax 8
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
; for crusades
;------------------------------------------

set_event_counter joinedcrusade 0

;Allows fl to read when a gen joins. Implemented, but not yet utilised
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GeneralJoinCrusade FactionIsLocal
                and IsCrusade
                and IsGeneral
	and CharacterReligion catholic
;	and Trait crusadecost = 1

set_event_counter joinedcrusade 1
	console_command add_money -5000
if I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -5000
	inc_counter inflation 50
end_if
	inc_counter noblecost 50
end_monitor
;deducts money when a general joins the crusade
;------------------------------------------
; for jihads
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event GeneralJoinCrusade FactionIsLocal
                and IsJihad
                and IsGeneral
	and CharacterReligion islam
;	and Trait jihadcost = 1

set_event_counter joinedcrusade 1
	console_command add_money -5000
if I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	console_command add_money -5000
	inc_counter inflation 50
end_if
	inc_counter noblecost 50
end_monitor
;deducts money when a general joins the jihad
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter joinedcrusade 0
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
;Chip Inflation
; new inflation costs should only be added to military expenses 1-4 sans mercs
; Also transfers inflation to noblecost if inflationon=1
;------------------------------------------

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if
;------------------------------------------

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 200
	inc_counter inflation -200
	inc_counter noblecost 200
;	console_command add_money -20000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 100
	inc_counter inflation -100
	inc_counter noblecost 100
;	console_command add_money -10000
	end_if
;------------------------------------------

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 40
	inc_counter inflation -40
	inc_counter noblecost 40
;	console_command add_money -4000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 30
	inc_counter inflation -30
	inc_counter noblecost 30
;	console_command add_money -3000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 20
	inc_counter inflation -20
	inc_counter noblecost 20
;	console_command add_money -2000
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 10
	inc_counter inflation -10
	inc_counter noblecost 10
;	console_command add_money -1000
	end_if
;------------------------------------------

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 4
	inc_counter inflation -4
	inc_counter noblecost 4
;	console_command add_money -400
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 3
	inc_counter inflation -3
	inc_counter noblecost 3
;	console_command add_money -300
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 2
	inc_counter inflation -2
	inc_counter noblecost 2
;	console_command add_money -200
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter inflation >= 1
	inc_counter inflation -1
	inc_counter noblecost 1
;	console_command add_money -100
	end_if
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed faction_button

	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 0
		historic_event nc_0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 1
		historic_event nc_01
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 2
		historic_event nc_02
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 3
		historic_event nc_03
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 4
		historic_event nc_04
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 5
		historic_event nc_05
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 6
		historic_event nc_06
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 7
		historic_event nc_07
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 8
		historic_event nc_08
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 9
		historic_event nc_09
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 10
		historic_event nc_10
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 11
		historic_event nc_11
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 12
		historic_event nc_12
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 13
		historic_event nc_13
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 14
		historic_event nc_14
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 15
		historic_event nc_15
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 16
		historic_event nc_16
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 17
		historic_event nc_17
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 18
		historic_event nc_18
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost = 19
		historic_event nc_19
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 20
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 29
		historic_event nc_20
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 30
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 39
		historic_event nc_30
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 40
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 49
		historic_event nc_40
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 50
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 59
		historic_event nc_50
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 60
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 69
		historic_event nc_60
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 70
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 79
		historic_event nc_70
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 80
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 89
		historic_event nc_80
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 90
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 99
		historic_event nc_90
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 100
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 199
		historic_event nc_100
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 200
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 299
		historic_event nc_200
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 300
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 399
		historic_event nc_300
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 400
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 499
		historic_event nc_400
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 500
	and I_CompareCounter noblecost <= 999
		historic_event nc_500
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter noblecost >= 1000
		historic_event nc_1000
	end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed faction_button
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 0
		historic_event nt_0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 1
		historic_event nt_01
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 2
		historic_event nt_02
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 3
		historic_event nt_03
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 4
		historic_event nt_04
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 5
		historic_event nt_05
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 6
		historic_event nt_06
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 7
		historic_event nt_07
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 8
		historic_event nt_08
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 9
		historic_event nt_09
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 10
		historic_event nt_10
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 11
		historic_event nt_11
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 12
		historic_event nt_12
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 13
		historic_event nt_13
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 14
		historic_event nt_14
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 15
		historic_event nt_15
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 16
		historic_event nt_16
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 17
		historic_event nt_17
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 18
		historic_event nt_18
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax = 19
		historic_event nt_19
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 20
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 29
		historic_event nt_20
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 30
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 39
		historic_event nt_30
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 40
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 49
		historic_event nt_40
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 50
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 59
		historic_event nt_50
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 60
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 69
		historic_event nt_60
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 70
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 79
		historic_event nt_70
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 80
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 89
		historic_event nt_80
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 90
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 99
		historic_event nt_90
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 100
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 199
		historic_event nt_100
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 200
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 299
		historic_event nt_200
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 300
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 399
		historic_event nt_300
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 400
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 499
		historic_event nt_400
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 500
	and I_CompareCounter nobletax <= 999
		historic_event nt_500
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter nobletax >= 1000
		historic_event nt_1000
	end_if
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_counter noblecost 0
        set_counter nobletax 0
	set_event_counter inflationon 0
	set_event_counter oldinflation 0
end_monitor
;------------------------------------------
;Inflation triggers
;------------------------------------------

	set_event_counter inflationon 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	set_event_counter inflationon 0
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
          and FactionScoreRank military = 6
          and FactionScoreRank regions >= 7
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
          and FactionScoreRank military = 5
          and FactionScoreRank regions >= 6
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
          and FactionScoreRank military = 4
          and FactionScoreRank regions >= 5
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
          and FactionScoreRank military = 3
          and FactionScoreRank regions >= 4
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
          and FactionScoreRank military = 2
          and FactionScoreRank regions >= 3
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and FactionScoreRank military = 1
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and FactionScoreRank regions = 1
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and FactionScoreRank treasury = 1
	set_event_counter inflationon 1
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
;show historic event if new inflation is diff to old inflation
;------------------------------------------
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter oldinflation = 1
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 0
	historic_event inflation_off
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter oldinflation = 0
	and I_EventCounter inflationon = 1
	historic_event inflation_on
end_monitor

;------------------------------------------
; BGR Settlement Script
;------------------------------------------

        declare_counter nowc 0

;while SettlementTurnEnd and SettlementIsLocal

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Inverness
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Inverness
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Inverness
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Inverness

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oslo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oslo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2

        and SettlementName Novgorod
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Novgorod
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Novgorod
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Moscow
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Moscow
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Moscow
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bulgar
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bulgar
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bulgar
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Edinburgh
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Edinburgh
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Edinburgh
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Smolensk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Smolensk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Smolensk
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dublin
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dublin
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dublin
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oleshe
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oleshe
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oleshe
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ryazan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ryazan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ryazan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Caernarvon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Caernarvon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Caernarvon
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Thorn
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Thorn
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Thorn
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Stettin
    if I_CompareCounter nowc >= 1
        inc_recruit_pool Stettin_Province -1 Mailed Knights

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Hamburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Hamburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Hamburg
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Hamburg

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sarkel
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Sarkel
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sarkel
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Antwerp
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Antwerp
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Antwerp
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Magdeburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Magdeburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Magdeburg
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Halych
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Halych
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Halych
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Wroclaw
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Wroclaw
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Wroclaw
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Kiev
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Kiev
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Kiev
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bruges
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bruges
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Bruges
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Frankfurt
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1

        and SettlementName Frankfurt
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Frankfurt
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Prague
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Prague
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Prague
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rheims
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rheims
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rheims
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rennes
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rennes
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rennes
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Nuremburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Nuremburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Nuremburg
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Paris
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Paris
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Paris
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Paris
    if I_CompareCounter nowc >= 1
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Mailed Knights
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Feudal Knights
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 English Knights
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Chivalric Knights
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Imperial Knights
        ;inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Lancers
        ;inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Gothic Knights
        ;inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Demi Lancers
        ;inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Gendarmes
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Italian MAA
        inc_recruit_pool Paris_Province -1 Norman Knights

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Staufen
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Staufen
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Staufen
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baia
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Esztergom
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Esztergom
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Esztergom
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Angers
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Angers
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Angers
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Vienna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Vienna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Vienna
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dijon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dijon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Dijon
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bern
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bern
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bern
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Innsbruck
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Innsbruck
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Innsbruck
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bordeaux

        and GovernorInResidence

        and SettlementName Tbilisi
        and not GovernorInResidence

        and SettlementName Targoviste
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Targoviste
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Targoviste
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Milan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9

        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Milan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Venice
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Venice
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Venice
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toulouse
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toulouse
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toulouse
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sofia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Sofia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sofia
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ragusa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ragusa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ragusa
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toledo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toledo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Toledo
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bologna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bologna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Bologna
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pisa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pisa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pisa
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Trebizond
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Trebizond
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Trebizond
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Marseille
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Marseille
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Marseille
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yerevan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yerevan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yerevan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zaragoza
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zaragoza
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zaragoza
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Thessalonica
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Thessalonica
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Thessalonica
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ajaccio
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ajaccio
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ajaccio
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Nicaea
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Nicaea
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Nicaea
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

    end_if
        set_counter nowc 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Caesarea
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Caesarea
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Caesarea
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baghdad
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baghdad
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Baghdad
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Cordoba
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Cordoba
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Cordoba
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iconium
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iconium
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iconium
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Adana
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Adana
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Adana
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Mosul
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Mosul
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Mosul
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Cagliari
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Cagliari
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Cagliari
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Edessa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Antioch
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Antioch
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Antioch
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Granada
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Granada
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Granada
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Aleppo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Aleppo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Aleppo
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Medina
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Medina
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Medina
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Marrakesh
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Marrakesh
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Marrakesh
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Nicosia

        set_counter nowc 2

        and SettlementName Nicosia

        set_counter nowc 2

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damascus
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damascus
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damascus
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Algiers
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Algiers
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Algiers
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iraklion
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iraklion
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Iraklion
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Jerusalem
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Jerusalem
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Jerusalem
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Gaza
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Gaza
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Gaza
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Alexandria
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9

        and SettlementName Alexandria
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Alexandria
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Alexandria

        inc_recruit_pool Alexandria_Province -1 Mailed Knights

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damietta
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damietta
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damietta
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Cairo
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9

        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Cairo
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Qarisiya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Qarisiya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Qarisiya
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Basra
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1

        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Basra
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lyon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lyon
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lyon
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sinop
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sinop
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Sinop
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Belgrade
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Belgrade
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Belgrade
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Barcelona

        and SettlementName Barcelona
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Barcelona
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Skara
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Skara
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Skara
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Exeter
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Exeter
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Exeter
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oporto
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oporto
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Oporto
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Tortosa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tortosa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tortosa
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Astrakhan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9

        set_counter nowc 2

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Luxor
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Luxor
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Luxor
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Clermont
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Clermont
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Clermont
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Groningen
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Groningen
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Groningen
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Salamanca
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Salamanca
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Salamanca
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Salzburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Salzburg
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Salzburg
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
