monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Diyarbakir
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Diyarbakir
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Diyarbakir
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Plock
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Plock
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Plock
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ancona
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ancona
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ancona
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Athens
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Athens
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Athens
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tmutarakan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tmutarakan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tmutarakan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Uppsala
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Uppsala
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Uppsala
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kassa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kassa
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kassa
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Silves
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Silves
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Silves
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Baku
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Baku
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Baku
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Murcia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Murcia
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Murcia
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mu'miniya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mu'miniya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mu'miniya
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Burgos
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Burgos
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Burgos
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yaroslavl
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yaroslavl
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yaroslavl
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Al_Aqaba
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Al_Aqaba
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Al_Aqaba
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ankara
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1

        and SettlementName Ankara
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ankara
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kerak
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kerak
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kerak
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Eikundarsund
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Eikundarsund
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Eikundarsund
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pskov
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pskov
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pskov
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Visby
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Visby
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Visby
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Roskilde
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Roskilde
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Roskilde
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lund
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lund
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Lund
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Urgench
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Urgench
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Urgench
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ray
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ray
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ray
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Isfahan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Isfahan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Isfahan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Shiraz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Shiraz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Shiraz
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Khiva
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Khiva
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Khiva
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kazan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kazan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kazan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tayma
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tayma
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tayma
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Jaiksk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Jaiksk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Jaiksk
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Yazd
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yazd
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yazd
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Yazd
    if I_CompareCounter nowc >= 1
        inc_recruit_pool Yazd_Province -1 Mailed Knights
        inc_recruit_pool Yazd_Province -1 Feudal Knights

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mahdiya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mahdiya
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Al-Mahdiya
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zhytomyr
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zhytomyr
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Zhytomyr
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Polotsk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1

        and SettlementName Polotsk
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Polotsk
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Embi
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Embi
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Embi
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damghan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Damghan
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Damghan
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rhodes
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rhodes
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Rhodes
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kermanshah
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kermanshah
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kermanshah
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tabriz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tabriz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Tabriz
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pereyaslav
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pereyaslav
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Pereyaslav
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Adrianople
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Adrianople
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Adrianople
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Oran
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Oran
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Oran
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Hrodna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Hrodna
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Hrodna
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Azaq

        and SettlementName Reval
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Reval
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Reval
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yelabuga
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yelabuga
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Yelabuga
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Alamut
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9

        and SettlementName Alamut
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Alamut
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Murom
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Murom
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Murom
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Isparta
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Isparta
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Isparta
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Kutaisi
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Kutaisi
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Kutaisi
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ahvaz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 9
        set_counter nowc 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementIsLocal
        and SettlementName Ahvaz
        and GovernorInResidence
        and GovernorAttribute Charm <= 4
        set_counter nowc 2
end_monitor

        and SettlementName Ahvaz
        and not GovernorInResidence
        set_counter nowc 2

        and SettlementName Serdobinskaya
        and GovernorInResidence
